paper.title: Analysis of integration of financial series classification and constrained portfolio optimization
paper.abstract: This paper proposes a new way of combining classification of financial asset price series and portfolio optimization, in which the optimization model has a constraint that ensures that the best rated assets in the classification process are present in the portfolio. This proposed combination is compared to each of the approaches applied separately. Trading simulation in the stock market using each of the strategies is carried out to evaluate the performance of each strategy, considering monthly performance metrics. Results show that portfolio optimization provides a lower risk, but classification shows great potential for a rapid increase in financial gain. The proposed combination manages to provide a greater gain than portfolio optimization, with a statistically equal risk, therefore, surpassing each of the individual approaches.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是将金融资产价格序列分类与投资组合优化相结合，并通过股票市场的交易模拟来评估策略性能。这直接涉及投资组合的构建和优化，属于投资组合管理领域。
